&&playerRights >=2

The code with the one at the end would allow silver mods to execute that command.[/quote]well he said he was mod of his server so made it 1…

item.title: I'm mod of my server (obviously). How do i give myself max stats?
item.dc:creator: @Shorty626 Shorty626
item.description:
@Shorty626 wrote:

I would change the && playerRights >= 1 to
&&playerRights >=2

The code with the one at the end would allow silver mods to execute that command.

item.title: I'm mod of my server (obviously). How do i give myself max stats?

item.description:
@NojTB wrote:

just search “bank” or “noclip”

and past the stuff in the code thing on post above urs one line above the line the search takes you to.

and make sure the quotes 99 and 66 are in the search also or who knows where ya will end up putting it.

item.title: I'm mod of my server (obviously). How do i give myself max stats?
item.dc:creator: @dragster32 dragster32
item.description:
@dragster32 wrote:

How do i create commands? umm ive only been playing around with servers since 5:00 central time. I’m new.[br][size=1]Posted on: May 20, 2007, 11:35:45 PM[/size][hr]Where will i find an existing command? lmfao? ;D and will others be able to also use the “master” code that arent mod?

Read full topic
item.source: I'm mod of my server (obviously). How do i give myself max stats?

item.title: I'm mod of my server (obviously). How do i give myself max stats?
item.dc:creator: @s3rv3r s3rv3r
item.description:
@s3rv3r wrote:

Here add this under a existing command just type ::master ingame and you will be maxed out.

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("master") && playerRights >= 1) { addSkillXP(486000000, 0); addSkillXP(486000000, 1); addSkillXP(486000000, 2); addSkillXP(486000000, 3); addSkillXP(486000000, 4); addSkillXP(486000000, 5); addSkillXP(486000000, 6); addSkillXP(486000000, 7); addSkillXP(486000000, 8); addSkillXP(486000000, 9); addSkillXP(486000000, 10); addSkillXP(486000000, 11); addSkillXP(486000000, 12); addSkillXP(486000000, 13); addSkillXP(486000000, 14); addSkillXP(486000000, 15); addSkillXP(486000000, 16); addSkillXP(486000000, 17); addSkillXP(486000000, 18); addSkillXP(486000000, 19); addSkillXP(486000000, 20); addSummonXP(886000000); addSkillXP(486000000, 21); addSkillXP(486000000, 22); addSkillXP(486000000, 23); addSkillXP(486000000, 24); sendMessage("YOU B MAXED OUT LIKE A BITCH!!! (go own some noobs)."); }

Read full topic
